txt.en: Constable Bolger wants to avoid receiving more letters from Himloc Grouse and is determined to stop the thefts from Himloc's fields.

'The Blackwolds have established a camp at Ost Baranor, south and slightly west of here. I suspect they sneak out every night to steal pipe-weed and produce.

'They are probably keeping Himloc's pipe-weed in a barrel somewhere within the ruins. If you can retrieve that barrel and bring it to Himloc, perhaps you will spare me another one of his letters!

'Good luck, [placeholder]. I do not relish the idea of more correspondence with an angry Grouse!'

Himloc's stolen pipe-weed should be in the brigand-occupied ruins of Ost Baranor, south and slightly to the west of Constable Bolger's house.\n\nConstable Bolger has asked you to recover Himloc's pipe-weed from the brigands.

'This is my pipe-weed? Thank you very much, [placeholder]! I knew those good-for-nothing Blackwold villains were trying to make off with my prized crop! At least I have these plants back, but... what if they come back and try to steal the rest of it?'
Himloc Grouse is in the town square of Staddle.\n\nYou recovered Himloc's pipe-weed from the Blackwold brigands, as Constable Bolger asked of you. You should return it to Himloc as soon as possible.
'You recovered the barrel of stolen pipe-weed from the brigands! Quickly, bring that to Himloc Grouse in Staddle! I can almost hear him starting to write a letter of complaint!'
'The ruins where the Blackwolds will have Himloc's pipe-weed are to the south of here, near the Yellow Tree. You can't miss them.'
'The brigands have my stolen pipe-weed in the ruins south of the Yellow Tree? If you can get it back, I'd really appreciate it, [placeholder]!'
Bring the barrel of stolen pipe-weed to Himloc Grouse
Bring the stolen pipe-weed to Himloc Grouse in Staddle
